structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Division of Women's Health -- Receipt of gifts, grants, and bequests.

text.section: The division may accept gifts, grants, and bequests in support of its mission and duties specified in subsection (1) of this section. All money received shall be administered by the cabinet, which shall administer these funds through appropriate trust and agency accounts.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 15, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 154, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 238, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 1, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 427, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1998.
